text: Laho ma ho paluhuthon saluhut halak Jahudi, angka na jumpang di Susan, jala marpuasa ma hamu manangiangkon ahu, unang hamu mangan manang minum tolu ari on, arian dohot borngin; ahu pe rap dohot boruboru pandonganingku marpuasa songon i, dung pe songon i asa masuk ahu tu adopan ni rajai, atik pe pantang bolon nian; molo tung mago ahu, ba mago ahu tusi!
